ciss_vae.training.autotune.autotune

autotune(search_space, train_dataset, save_model_path=None, save_search_space_path=None, n_trials=20, study_name='vae_autotune', device_preference='cuda', optuna_dashboard_db=None, load_if_exists=True, seed=42, verbose=False, show_progress=False, constant_layer_size=False, evaluate_all_orders=False, max_exhaustive_orders=100, return_history=False, n_jobs=1, debug=False)[source]

Optuna-based hyperparameter search for the CISSVAE model.

Runs initial training followed by impute-refit loops per trial, selecting the trial with the lowest validation MSE. The best model is then retrained with optimal hyperparameters and returned along with the imputed dataset.

Parameters:

  • search_space (SearchSpace) – Hyperparameter ranges and fixed values for optimization

  • train_dataset (ClusterDataset) – Dataset containing masks, normalization, and cluster labels

  • save_model_path (str, optional) – Optional path to save the best model’s state_dict, defaults to None

  • save_search_space_path (str, optional) – Optional path to dump the resolved search-space configuration, defaults to None

  • n_trials (int, optional) – Number of Optuna trials to run, defaults to 20

  • study_name (str, optional) – Name identifier for the Optuna study, defaults to “vae_autotune”

  • device_preference (str, optional) – Preferred device (“cuda” or “cpu”), falls back to CPU if CUDA unavailable, defaults to “cuda”

  • optuna_dashboard_db (str, optional) – RDB storage URL/file for Optuna dashboard or None for in-memory, defaults to None

  • load_if_exists (bool, optional) – Whether to load existing study with the same name from storage, defaults to True

  • seed (int, optional) – Base random number generator seed for reproducible order generation, defaults to 42

  • verbose (bool, optional) – Whether to print detailed diagnostic logs during training, defaults to False

  • show_progress (bool, optional) – Whether to display Rich progress bars during training, defaults to False

  • constant_layer_size (bool, optional) – Whether all hidden layers should use the same dimension size, defaults to False

  • evaluate_all_orders (bool, optional) – Whether to permute and evaluate all possible shared/unshared layer orders, defaults to False

  • max_exhaustive_orders (int, optional) – Maximum number of layer order permutations to test when evaluate_all_orders is True, defaults to 100

  • return_history (bool, optional) – Whether to return MSE training history dataframe of the best model, defaults to False

  • n_jobs (int, optional) – Number of jobs to run for autotuning (passed to optuna). Defaults to 1

Returns:

Tuple containing (best_imputed_dataframe, best_model, optuna_study_object, results_dataframe[, best_model_history_df])

Return type:

tuple[pandas.DataFrame, CISSVAE, optuna.study.Study, pandas.DataFrame] or tuple[pandas.DataFrame, CISSVAE, optuna.study.Study, pandas.DataFrame, pandas.DataFrame]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If search space parameters are malformed or incompatible

  • RuntimeError – If CUDA is requested but not available and fallback fails
